name: Establishes Frame Theorems
description: Establishes fundamental mathematical theorems that govern the properties and relationships of temporal reference frames.
subject: urn:uor:resource:temporal-observer-frames
contextualDescription: The Temporal Observer Frames resource establishes four key theorems: the Temporal Frame Existence Theorem guaranteeing optimal frames for any process, the Frame Compatibility Theorem ensuring reconcilable perspectives, the Temporal Invariant Theorem identifying observer-independent quantities, and the Frame Bundle Curvature Theorem relating bundle geometry to observer-dependence.
